name: Prospective Commercial ASHP (FS) CC
_description: Ultra-efficient heat pump target, switch fossil-based heating and associated cooling to heat pumps, cold-climate; include chillers for prospective measure under the assumption that these performance levels can be achieve for large commercial applications

market_entry_year_source.notes: Targeted year of breakthrough technology market entry

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Most aggressive performance level expected to be achievable via breakthrough R&D

installed_cost_source.notes: Cost that yields a 5 year overall payback period for given performance level based on FS application in cold climate

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B30 -  Cooling energy sources, number of buildings and floorspace
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Assume the prospective measure switches all non-electric heating technologies in the definition; cooling fraction excludes cooling in buildings that use electric source of primary heating ((79,294-25,613) sf/ 79,294 sf).
